title: 고급 대조 표현 - 극명한 차이
description: 극명한 차이와 대비를 강조하는 원어민 수준의 강력한 대조 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: They're polar opposites. There's no comparison.
They're as different as night and day.
It's a world of difference. They're not even in the same league.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 극명한 차이 표현 구사

sentences.en: They're polar opposites. There's no comparison.
They're as different as night and day.

sentences.kr: 천지차이야. 같은 범주에 넣을 수도 없어.
sentences.en: It's a world of difference. They're not even in the same league.
The difference is like heaven and earth.
It's in a completely different dimension altogether.
They're so different that comparison itself is meaningless.
They're heading in completely opposite directions.
It's like they're from different worlds entirely.
